overview.title: Dashboard Overview
overview.description: View comprehensive analytics and statistics for your profile performance

features.name: Profile Statistics Cards
features.description: View username, alias, UID, profile views, and total link clicks in dedicated cards

features.name: Profile Views Chart
features.description: Interactive chart showing profile views over time with multiple time ranges

features.name: Time Range Selection
features.description: Switch between 24h, 7d, 14d, and 30d time ranges for all analytics

features.name: Visitor Devices Analytics
features.description: See breakdown of visitor devices (Desktop, Mobile, Tablet, Unknown)

features.name: Top Countries Viewer
features.description: View which countries your visitors are from with country names and visitor counts

features.name: Top Clicked Links
features.description: See which of your links get the most clicks with detailed statistics

features.name: Profile Feedback
features.description: View feedback and ratings left by visitors to your profile

features.name: Profile Comments
features.description: View comments left by visitors to your profile

features.name: Hourly Views (24h)
features.description: Detailed hourly breakdown of profile views for the last 24 hours

customize.title: Customize
customize.description: Comprehensive profile customization with colors, audio, backgrounds, and visual effects

features.name: Description
features.description: Customize your profile description with a custom description.

features.name: Avatar Radius
features.description: Customize your profile avatar radius with a slider.

features.name: Profile Opacity
features.description: Customize your profile opacity with a slider.

features.name: Profile Blur
features.description: Customize your profile blur with a slider.

features.name: Background Effect
features.description: Customize your profile background effect with a selection of effects.

features.name: Background Effect Settings
features.description: Customize your profile background effect settings with a selection of settings.

features.name: Background Effect Animations
features.description: You can choose between Blurred Background, Night Time, Old TV, Snow, Floating Particles, Falling Leaves, Shooting Stars, Rain & VHS Backroom Bodycam.

features.name: Username/Display Name Effect
features.description: Customize your profile username/display name effect with a selection of effects.

features.name: Username/Display Name Effect Settings
features.description: Customize your profile username/display name effect settings with a selection of settings.

features.name: Username/Display Name Effect Animations
features.description: You can choose between Rainbow, Glow, Typewriter & Particles.

features.name: Location
features.description: Customize your profile location with a country flag or country name.

features.name: Enter Text
features.description: Customize your profile enter text with a custom text.

features.name: Accent Color Picker
features.description: Choose custom accent color for highlights and interactive elements with hex color picker

features.name: Text Color Customization
features.description: Set custom text color for all text elements on your profile

features.name: Background Color Control
features.description: Customize your profile's background color with color picker

features.name: Icon Color Settings
features.description: Change the color of icons throughout your profile

features.name: Gradient Background
features.description: Enable gradient backgrounds with primary and secondary color selection

features.name: Gradient Angle Control
features.description: Adjust gradient angle from 0° to 360° with interactive slider

features.name: Audio File Upload
features.description: Upload custom audio files (MP3, WAV, OGG) for background music

features.name: Audio Cover Upload
features.description: Upload custom cover images for your audio tracks

features.name: Audio Title Editing
features.description: Set custom titles for your uploaded audio tracks

features.name: Audio External URLs
features.description: Add external URLs to your audio tracks for additional information

features.name: Audio Shuffle Control
features.description: Enable or disable shuffle mode for multiple audio tracks

features.name: Audio Player Visibility
features.description: Control whether the audio player is visible to visitors

features.name: Audio Volume Control
features.description: Enable or disable volume controls for visitors

features.name: Audio Track Activation
features.description: Activate or deactivate individual audio tracks

features.name: Audio Track Reordering
features.description: Drag and drop to reorder your audio tracks

features.name: Audio Track Deletion
features.description: Delete audio tracks and their associated files

features.name: Audio Track Editing
features.description: Edit existing audio track titles, covers, and external URLs

features.name: Audio File Validation
features.description: Automatic validation of audio file types and sizes

features.name: General Profile Settings
features.description: General customization options for overall profile appearance, such as location and profile effects.

features.name: Border Customization
features.description: Customize profile card borders with colors and styles

features.name: YouTube URL Integration
features.description: Integrate YouTube videos or playlists into your profile

features.name: About Me
features.description: Create an About Me section on your profile with supported Markdown formatting.

features.name: About Me Custom Emojis
features.description: You can use custom emojis in your About Me section with supported markdown. You can also join our [Discord server](https://discord.gg/hauntbio) and run the `/emoji` command to get the markdown code for the custom emoji you want to use.

features.name: Time Customization
features.description: Display join date and customize the time format used on your profile.

features.name: Volume Control
features.description: Toggle the volume control on your profile.

features.name: Profile Feedback (Likes/Dislikes)
features.description: Toggle the profile feedback (likes/dislikes) on your profile.

features.name: Profile Views
features.description: Toggle the profile views on your profile.

features.name: Parallax Effect
features.description: Toggle the parallax effect on your profile.

features.name: Parallax Effect Settings
features.description: Customize the parallax effect settings like intensity and inverted on your profile.

features.name: Title Animation
features.description: Toggle the title animation on your profile.

features.name: Profile Comments
features.description: Toggle the profile comments on your profile.

features.name: Profile Comments Privacy
features.description: Toggle the profile comments privacy on your profile.

features.name: Force Enter Screen
features.description: Force enable the enter screen on your profile.

features.name: Cursor Manager
features.description: The cursor manager allows you to set a Regular Cursor and Pointer Cursor

features.name: Audio Manager Download Option
features.description: Downlaod uploaded songs from the audio manager.

features.name: Reset Buttons for Inputs
features.description: All buttons and imputs have a reset button.

features.name: Background Manager
features.description: The background manager allows you to set a background and if you have premium, you can set 3 backgrounds.

features.name: Discord Avatar Sync
features.description: Sync your avatar with your Discord avatar.

layout.title: Layout
layout.description: Choose and customize different layout themes for your profile

features.name: Theme Selection
features.description: Choose between Default, Modern, Simplistic, and Portfolio theme layouts

features.name: Default Theme Settings
features.description: Customize your profile layout. Default theme has these extra features: Banner Uploads & Social Cards (Brawl Stars, Clash of Clans, Discord Presence/Bot/Server, GitHub, Instagram, Last.fm, Melonly, Minecraft, Roblox, Spotify, Stats.fm, Steam, Telegram, TikTok, Twitch, Twitter, Valorant, Weather & YouTube)

features.name: Default Theme Social Cards
features.description: Here you can add/remove/edit your social cards and add up to 1 social cards

features.name: Modern Theme Social Cards
features.description: Here you can add/remove/edit your social cards and add up to 4 social cards

features.name: Modern Theme Settings
features.description: Customize your profile layout. Modern theme has these extra features:  Social Cards (Brawl Stars, Clash of Clans, Discord Presence/Bot/Server, GitHub, Instagram, Last.fm, Melonly, Minecraft, Roblox, Spotify, Stats.fm, Steam, Telegram, TikTok, Twitch, Twitter, Valorant, Weather & YouTube)

features.name: Simplistic Theme Settings
features.description: Customize your profile layout. Simplistic theme has these extra features: Show your Socials as Buttons like on Linktr.ee

features.name: Portfolio Theme Settings
features.description: Customize your profile layout. Portfolio theme has these extra features: Projects, Skills, About Me, & Social Cards (Brawl Stars, Clash of Clans, Discord Presence/Bot/Server, GitHub, Instagram, Last.fm, Melonly, Minecraft, Roblox, Spotify, Stats.fm, Steam, Telegram, TikTok, Twitch, Twitter, Valorant, Weather & YouTube)

features.name: Portfolio Theme Social Cards
features.description: Here you can add/remove/edit your social cards and add up to 4 social cards

features.name: Portfolio Theme Projects
features.description: Here you can add/remove/edit your projects and add up to 4 projects

features.name: Portfolio Theme Skills
features.description: Here you can add/remove/edit your skills

features.name: Layout Responsiveness
features.description: Ensure optimal display across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices

features.name: Custom Layout Elements
features.description: Add, remove, or rearrange layout elements within your chosen theme

features.name: Social Integration Customization
features.description: Customize your discord card appearance & styling of your social cards.

features.name: Button Count per Row Setting
features.description: Button Count per Row setting.

features.name: Animation Customization for Portfolio Theme
features.description: Customize animations for the Portfolio Theme.

features.name: Project Scroll Text Change
features.description: Option to change Project Scroll Text (Portfolio Theme)

features.name: Project Limit
features.description: Project Limit for portfolio theme is 10.

decoration.title: Profile Decorations
decoration.description: Browse and apply decorative elements to enhance your profile appearance

features.name: Decoration Gallery
features.description: Browse available decorative elements and effects

features.name: Decoration Preview
features.description: Preview decorations before applying them to your profile

features.name: Decoration Categories
features.description: Browse decorations by different categories and themes

features.name: Decoration Application
features.description: Apply selected decorations to your profile

features.name: Decoration Management
features.description: Manage and remove applied decorations

features.name: Pagination Controls
features.description: Navigate through multiple pages of available decorations

features.name: Decoration Search
features.description: Search for specific decorations by name or theme

premium.title: Premium
premium.description: Exclusive premium features for enhanced profile customization and functionality

features.name: Alias Token
features.description: Get an alias token when buying premium.

features.name: Animated Borders
features.description: Add animated border effects to your profile cards and elements

features.name: Border Animation Types
features.description: Choose from various border animation styles and effects

features.name: Custom Cursor Effects
features.description: Add custom cursor trails and effects for profile visitors

features.name: Cursor Trail Customization
features.description: Customize cursor trail colors, shapes, and behavior

features.name: Premium Font Library
features.description: Access to exclusive premium fonts: Satoshi, Outfit, Poppins, Chillax, Alpino, Bespoke Stencil, Array, Chomsky

features.name: Custom Font Upload
features.description: Upload your own custom fonts (WOFF2, WOFF, TTF, OTF files up to 5MB)

features.name: Font Preview System
features.description: Live preview of how fonts will look on your profile

features.name: Custom Font Management
features.description: Upload, delete, and manage custom font files

features.name: Profile Animation Control
features.description: Enable and customize profile entrance and hover animations

features.name: Profile Metadata Settings
features.description: Advanced metadata and SEO settings for your profile

features.name: Typewriter Effect Descriptions
features.description: Add animated typewriter effects to your profile descriptions

features.name: Typewriter Speed Control
features.description: Adjust the speed and timing of typewriter animations

features.name: Profile Visibility Settings
features.description: Advanced visibility controls for your metadata image

features.name: Premium Theme Access
features.description: Access to exclusive premium themes and layouts

features.name: Domain Manager
features.description: Add your own domain to show your haunt.gg page on your custom domain.

badges.title: Badges
badges.description: Manage, customize, and display your profile badges and achievements

features.name: Badge Color Customization
features.description: Change the primary color of your badges with color picker

features.name: Monochrome Badge Mode
features.description: Enable or disable monochrome (black & white) badge display

features.name: Badge Glow Effects
features.description: Add or remove glow effects around your badges

features.name: Advanced Badge Customization
features.description: Enable advanced badge customization options

features.name: Badge Accent Color
features.description: Set accent colors for badge highlights and details

features.name: Badge Opacity Control
features.description: Adjust badge transparency from 0-100% with slider

features.name: Badge Border Settings
features.description: Enable or disable borders around badges

features.name: Badge Border Color
features.description: Customize the color of badge borders

features.name: Badge Border Width
features.description: Adjust border thickness from 0-10px with slider

features.name: Badge Border Opacity
features.description: Control border transparency from 0-100%

features.name: Badge Border Radius
features.description: Adjust corner roundness of badges from 0-50px

features.name: Regular Badges Management
features.description: View and manage standard platform badges

features.name: Custom Badges Management
features.description: Create, edit, and manage custom user badges

features.name: Badge Display Control
features.description: Choose which badges to show or hide on your profile

features.name: Badge Color Editor
features.description: Advanced color editing for individual badges

features.name: Badge Organization
features.description: Arrange and organize badges in your preferred order

features.name: Custom Badges Preview
features.description: You can preview custom badges before adding them to your profile.

guides.description: Be a owner of haunt.gg.
Be a manager of haunt.gg.
Be a part of the haunt.gg staff team.
Be a part of the haunt.gg helper team.
Be an early supporter of haunt.gg.
Purchase or be a known content creator.
Report a bug to the haunt.gg team.
Donate at least 10€ to haunt.gg.
Purchase the premium package.
Take place in the top 10 of the leaderboard.
Boost the haunt.gg discord server.
Be a part of haunt.gg beta team.
Suggest an innovative feature that improves our platform.
Contribute to the official haunt.gg documentation.
Add a custom domain to Image Host.
Win a haunt.gg event
Get second place in a haunt.gg event.
Get third place in a haunt.gg event.
Refer 5 users to unlock this exclusive badge.
Gift a haunt.gg product to another user.
Purchase the Image Host storage extension.
Obtain our guild tag on the haunt.gg discord server.
Exclusive badge from the halloween sale.
Exclusive badge from the christmas sale.
Participate in an event voting process to draw a winner. (haunt.gg/vote)

links.title: Links
links.description: Add, manage, and customize social media links and custom URLs

features.name: Social Platform Integration
features.description: Add links to 20+ social platforms including Discord, Twitter, Instagram, YouTube, GitHub, etc.

features.name: Custom Link Creation
features.description: Create custom links with personalized titles and URLs

features.name: Link Type Selection
features.description: Choose between hyperlinks (clickable) and copyable text for each link

features.name: Custom Icon Upload
features.description: Upload custom icons for your links (PNG, JPG, GIF, WebP up to 2MB)

features.name: Platform Icon Library
features.description: Choose from a library of pre-made social platform icons

features.name: Link Color Customization
features.description: Customize the background and text colors of individual links

features.name: Link Reordering
features.description: Drag and drop to reorder your links in the desired sequence

features.name: Link Activation Control
features.description: Enable or disable individual links without deleting them

features.name: Link Analytics
features.description: View detailed click statistics and analytics for each link

features.name: Link Validation
features.description: Automatic validation of URLs and usernames for different platforms

features.name: Crypto Address Support
features.description: Add cryptocurrency addresses (Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin) as copyable text

features.name: Platform Search
features.description: Search through available social platforms when adding links

features.name: Link Preview
features.description: Preview how links will appear on your profile before saving

features.name: Bulk Link Operations
features.description: Perform operations on multiple links simultaneously

features.name: Link Import/Export
features.description: Import or export your link configurations

assets.title: Assets
assets.description: Upload avatars, backgrounds and other profile assets that are publicly visible to all users. Other users can apply these assets directly or download them.

features.name: Avatar Upload
features.description: Upload your own avatar images that are publicly visible and usable by all users.

features.name: Background Upload
features.description: Upload background images that can be used by other users for their profiles or downloaded.

features.name: Public Asset Gallery
features.description: Browse through all uploaded avatars, backgrounds and media – visible and usable by everyone.

features.name: Apply Asset
features.description: Select an asset from the gallery and apply it directly to your own profile.

features.name: Asset Download
features.description: Download each public asset as a file.

features.name: Asset Owner Info
features.description: See who uploaded an asset.

features.name: Asset Preview
features.description: Preview assets before using or downloading them.

features.name: Sorting and Filtering Functions
features.description: Sort and filter assets by type (avatar, background, etc.), popularity or latest.

templates.title: Profile Templates
templates.description: Create, manage, and use profile templates for quick customization

features.name: Template Creation
features.description: Create new profile templates from your current customization settings

features.name: Template Editing
features.description: Edit existing template names, descriptions, and settings

features.name: My Templates
features.description: View and manage templates you've created

features.name: Public Templates
features.description: Browse templates shared by other users

features.name: Favorite Templates
features.description: Save and organize your favorite templates from the community

features.name: Template Privacy Settings
features.description: Set templates as public or private

features.name: Template Preview
features.description: Preview how templates will look before applying them

features.name: Template Application
features.description: Apply template settings to your profile with one click

features.name: Template Sharing
features.description: Share your templates with the community

features.name: Template Search
features.description: Search through available templates by name or tags

features.name: Template Categories
features.description: Browse templates by categories and themes

features.name: Template Deletion
features.description: Delete your own templates with confirmation

apply.title: Apply
apply.description: Apply for special roles, positions, services, and affiliate codes through the admin-reviewed application system

features.name: Application Browsing
features.description: Browse available applications and opportunities, including affiliate code applications

features.name: Affiliate Code Applications
features.description: Apply for affiliate codes through the admin review process - the only way to obtain affiliate codes

features.name: Application Form Filling
features.description: Fill out detailed application forms with various question types for different opportunities

features.name: Application Preview
features.description: Preview your application before submitting to ensure all information is correct

features.name: My Applications Tracking
features.description: Track the status of all your submitted applications, including affiliate code requests

features.name: Application Status Updates
features.description: Receive updates on application progress (Pending, Approved, Rejected) with admin notifications

features.name: Application History
features.description: View your complete application history and past submissions across all application types

features.name: Question Renderer
features.description: Advanced form system supporting multiple question types and formats for comprehensive applications

features.name: Application Notes
features.description: View feedback and notes from admin reviewers on your applications

features.name: Application Requirements
features.description: View detailed requirements and criteria for each application type, including affiliate eligibility

features.name: Application Deadlines
features.description: See submission deadlines and time remaining for time-sensitive applications

features.name: Admin Review Process
features.description: Applications are reviewed by administrators who make approval decisions based on set criteria

affiliate.title: Affiliate
affiliate.description: Manage your affiliate program, referrals, and view all earned rewards. Affiliate codes are only available through admin approval via application system.

features.name: Affiliate Code Management
features.description: View and manage your admin-approved affiliate codes (codes must be obtained through application system)

features.name: Referral Tracking
features.description: Track users you've referred and their status

features.name: Complete Rewards Overview
features.description: View all rewards earned from affiliate activities, referrals, and other sources in one centralized location

features.name: Reward Cards System
features.description: View and manage all types of reward cards earned through various activities

features.name: Code Redemption
features.description: Redeem affiliate codes and promotional codes from other affiliates

features.name: Referral Statistics
features.description: View detailed statistics about your referral performance

features.name: Commission Tracking
features.description: Track all commissions earned from successful referrals and affiliate activities

features.name: Comprehensive Rewards History
features.description: View complete history of all rewards, bonuses, and earnings from all sources

features.name: Affiliate Link Generation
features.description: Generate custom affiliate links for promotions (only available with approved affiliate code)

features.name: Performance Metrics
features.description: View conversion rates, click-through rates, and other performance metrics

features.name: Application Status Tracking
features.description: Check the status of your affiliate code application if you haven't been approved yet

imagehost_overview.title: Image Host Overview
imagehost_overview.description: View your image host upload statistics and customize your image host settings.

features.name: Image Host Analytics
features.description: View detailed analytics such as total uploads, storage usage, and more.
features.location: Top of the Image Host Overview page

features.name: Image Host General Customization
features.description: Customize settings like the domain, auto-deletion, timezone, and more.

features.name: Image Host Embed Settings
features.description: Customize the Discord embed that appears when sharing an image link.

features.name: Image Host API Key
features.description: View or regenerate your API key. The API key is required for use with upload clients.

features.name: Image Host Upload Clients
features.description: Download configuration files for upload clients like ShareX, Apple Shortcuts, iShare, or Flameshot.

features.name: Image Host Domain
features.description: Choose from multiple available domains for hosting your images.

features.name: Image Host Auto Deletion
features.description: Set a timer to automatically delete your uploaded images after a certain period.

features.name: Image Host File Name
features.description: Customize the length of randomly generated file names.

features.name: Image Host Time Settings
features.description: Adjust time-related settings such as timezone, time format, and time schema.

features.name: Image Host Export Images
features.description: Export all your uploaded files for backup or migration purposes.

features.name: Image Host Wipe
features.description: Delete all your uploaded files at once.

features.name: Image Host Invisible URL
features.description: Add invisible characters to URLs to make them harder to detect in Discord.

features.name: Image Host Hide File Extension
features.description: Remove the file extension from uploaded image URLs.

features.name: Image Host Anonymous Upload
features.description: Hide your username from uploaded files for privacy.

features.name: Image Host Discord Embed
features.description: Enable Discord embeds for your uploaded image links.

features.name: Image Host Embed Variables
features.description: Use dynamic variables in your Discord embed to display information automatically.

features.name: Supported services
features.description: ShareX, iShare, iOS Shortcut, Flameshot, xShare

features.name: Custom Domain Management
features.description: Add your custom domain to imagehost.

imagehost_upload.title: Image Host Upload
imagehost_upload.description: Upload images to your image host easily.

features.name: Upload Images
features.description: Upload images to your image host by selecting files or using drag & drop.

imagehost_gallery.title: Image Host Gallery
imagehost_gallery.description: View and manage all your uploaded images.

features.name: View Uploaded Images
features.description: Browse all images you have uploaded to your image host.

features.name: Delete Uploaded Images
features.description: Easily delete uploaded images. Locate your file and click the red trash bin icon.

features.name: Download Uploaded Files
features.description: Download any uploaded file from your image host to your device.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Manage your account settings, security, and personal information

features.name: Display Name Settings
features.description: Change your display name shown on your profile

features.name: Display Name Cooldown
features.description: You can change your display name without any cooldown.

features.name: Username Settings
features.description: Update your username and profile URL

features.name: Username Settings Cooldown
features.description: You can change your username without any cooldown if you have premium or verified, otherwise you need to wait 3 days before changing your username again.

features.name: Alias Settings
features.description: Create alias usernames that redirect to your main profile.

features.name: Alias Settings Cooldown
features.description: You can change your alias without any cooldown.

features.name: Email Address Management
features.description: Update your email address and notification preferences

features.name: Discord Integration
features.description: Connect or disconnect your Discord account for profile features

features.name: Discord Role Sync
features.description: Sync your discord roles with your profile

features.name: Password Management
features.description: Change your account password with security validation

features.name: Two-Factor Authentication
features.description: Enable, configure, or disable 2FA for enhanced security

features.name: Passkeys
features.description: Add passkeys for easier login into your haunt account.

features.name: 2FA Recovery Codes
features.description: Generate and manage backup recovery codes for 2FA

features.name: Session Management
features.description: View and manage all active sessions and login locations

features.name: Active Session Monitoring
features.description: Monitor active sessions with device and location information

features.name: Session Termination
features.description: Terminate individual sessions or all sessions remotely

features.name: Alias Settings
features.description: Manage your aliases

billing.title: Billing
billing.description: See your recent invoices and manage your billing information

features.name: Recent Invoices
features.description: See your recent invoices and their status

features.name: Invoice Details
features.description: See the details of an invoice

comparison.title: Comparison
comparison.description: We don’t compare haunt.gg to other biolink services. Every biolink is unique, and we focus on making ours stand out in its own way.

features.name: No Direct Comparisons
features.description: We avoid comparing haunt.gg with other biolink platforms to respect their individuality.

features.name: Uniqueness Focus
features.description: Our goal is to make haunt.gg unique rather than compete directly with others.

uid.description: A UID (Unique Identifier) is a unique numerical code assigned to each user profile
uid.usage: Used for quick profile access via haunt.gg/uid/[number]

newsletter.description: You can subscribe to our newsletter to get the latest updates and news about Haunt.

additional_information.1-letter-usernames: 1 letter usernames can be bought on our discord server for 10€

ai_guidance.unanswerable: If the AI can't answer a question, please check our documentation at https://help.haunt.gg or join our Discord server at discord.gg/hauntbio for assistance.
ai_guidance.missing_information: If something is missing from the AI knowledge, please report it in our Discord so the team can update the knowledge base.

gifting.description: Products can be gifted to other users via the billing page.
gifting.how_to_gift: After purchasing, use the 'Gift' button on your billing page to send a product as a gift.
gifting.gifter_badge: Users who gift products receive a 'Gifter' badge on their profile.

common_issues.account_recovery: Contact via Discord with your email
common_issues.payment_issues: Include transaction ID in support ticket

giveaways.giveaways: Regular giveaways happen on our Discord server.

legal.account_deletion: Account deletion can be rquested via email. No other platforms than email allowed.

data_handling.data_retention: Account deletion after 30 days of request

rules.account-limit: Free Users: 3 accounts, Premium Users: 5 accounts
rules.custom-badges: Imperonations, NSFW or Official Badges are not allowed
